featured.text: A typical room of a capsule hotel is roughly the length and width of a single bed, with sufficient height for a guest to crawl in and sit up on the bed.
They had apparently pulled out the back seat, crawled behind it, and then had not been able to push the seat forward again.
Guests have to crawl into bed through a large porthole entrance.

definition.zh_def: 爬行，通常指用手和膝蓋或手腳移動。
definition.en_def: To move on hands and knees or by dragging the body close to the ground.
definition.example: The baby learned to crawl before he could walk.
